nodes.title: OMI glTF Working Group Meeting 2024-05-16
nodes.body:
This meeting is on 2024-05-16 at 21:30 UTC / 2:30 PM PDT in the [OMI Discord](https://discord.gg/J4vyAWFgkj) within the "Weekly Meeting" voice channel. During the meeting, we will be using the #omi-gltf-extensions text channel to post links and engage in further discussion.

To be notified of this meeting and others, subscribe to the [OMI Meetings and Events Calendar](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/u/1?cid=Y18wZHB1Z2Y5ZjgzZXE0cWVrbWI2b21xYmptZ0Bncm91cC5jYWxlbmRhci5nb29nbGUuY29t) or add yourself to the @omi-gltf-subgroup role in the #roles channel of the OMI Discord.

nodes.title: OMI glTF Working Group Meeting 2024-04-25
nodes.body:
This meeting is on 2024-04-25 at 21:30 UTC / 2:30 PM PDT in the [OMI Discord](https://discord.gg/J4vyAWFgkj) within the "Weekly Meeting" voice channel. During the meeting, we will be using the #omi-gltf-extensions text channel to post links and engage in further discussion.

To be notified of this meeting and others, subscribe to the [OMI Meetings and Events Calendar](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/u/1?cid=Y18wZHB1Z2Y5ZjgzZXE0cWVrbWI2b21xYmptZ0Bncm91cC5jYWxlbmRhci5nb29nbGUuY29t) or add yourself to the @omi-gltf-subgroup role in the #roles channel of the OMI Discord.

We discussed KHR_animation_pointer and the possible uses of being able to import animations that manipulate arbitrary properties. We also discussed a bit about possible ways to implement this extension.

nodes.title: OMI glTF Working Group Meeting 2024-04-18
nodes.body:
This meeting is on 2024-04-18 at 21:30 UTC / 2:30 PM PDT in the [OMI Discord](https://discord.gg/J4vyAWFgkj) within the "Weekly Meeting" voice channel. During the meeting, we will be using the #omi-gltf-extensions text channel to post links and engage in further discussion.

To be notified of this meeting and others, subscribe to the [OMI Meetings and Events Calendar](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/u/1?cid=Y18wZHB1Z2Y5ZjgzZXE0cWVrbWI2b21xYmptZ0Bncm91cC5jYWxlbmRhci5nb29nbGUuY29t) or add yourself to the @omi-gltf-subgroup role in the #roles channel of the OMI Discord.

The Mee6 recording bot is back! Meetings will be recorded again. The data from these will be available in OMI archive: https://omigroup.github.io/omi-archive/ We discussed if we want the full audio to be archived, this is generally seen as a good idea, but there are some technical challenges with the file size of the audio files.
We discussed support for KHR_xmp_json_ld including how to handle DCMI metadata and metadata from other scopes.

We discussed some work on OMI_physics_gravity and we did some brainstorming about OMI_vehicle_*. Ant mentioned Rapier uses general-purpose physics joints with motors for vehicle wheels: https://rapier.rs/docs/user_guides/rust/joints/#joint-motors

nodes.title: OMI glTF Working Group Meeting 2024-04-11
nodes.body:
This meeting is on 2024-04-11 at 21:30 UTC / 2:30 PM PDT in the [OMI Discord](https://discord.gg/J4vyAWFgkj) within the "Weekly Meeting" voice channel. During the meeting, we will be using the #omi-gltf-extensions text channel to post links and engage in further discussion.

To be notified of this meeting and others, subscribe to the [OMI Meetings and Events Calendar](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/u/1?cid=Y18wZHB1Z2Y5ZjgzZXE0cWVrbWI2b21xYmptZ0Bncm91cC5jYWxlbmRhci5nb29nbGUuY29t) or add yourself to the @omi-gltf-subgroup role in the #roles channel of the OMI Discord.
First item on the agenda: PR for updating the extension support table https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/pull/217
@antpb did some work on glTF-Transform support for KHR_audio_emitter, and Three.js support for KHR_audio_emitter via [three-omi](https://www.npmjs.com/package/three-omi).
